medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experiences bedwetting at least three times per week, beginning from birth without waking up during episodes. At age 10, this pattern persisted during a 3-month observation period.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has nephrogenic diabetes insipidus (NDI) due to a mutation in the V2 receptor gene (C358X).
medical_history.family_history: The patient's brother also has nephrogenic diabetes insipidus due to the same mutation, and a sister has PNE without renal concentration ability impairment.
